name: Retro Slasher
description:
8-BIT SURVIVAL HORROR

In Retro Slasher, you play as a counselor helping set up at a summer camp. But you're not alone in these woods...

The locals warned you, the owners cautioned you, and now it may be too late. Can you survive, or will you and all of your friends suffer a terrible fate at the hands of a mysterious killer?

Gameplay

Begin playing within seconds. You start outside a camp building. The killer will begin attacking any minute. He may choose you, or one of your fellow counselors. Use downtime to explore the grounds for tools you can use to defeat him.

Runs typically last a few minutes. Replay and find new ways to defeat the killer!

Items

You can collect items to help you defeat the killer. Items include:

Axe: High attack power, chops down obstacles
Knife: Medium attack power, easy to locate
Lantern: Keeps you well-lit at night, protects you from ambushes by the killer

... and more.

Controls Keyboard

Move: Arrow keys, WASD
Run: Left Shift, Z, Right-click
Attack: Spacebar, X, Left-click

Gamepad

Move: Left thumbstick, D-pad
Run: X, Y, Left trigger, Right bumper, L3
Attack: A, B, Right trigger, Left bumper, R3
